entry.title: The Root - Black Edition
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Bold Salts
Price: 19.99

The Root is one of our proudest achievements that took over 2 years to develop. Our mission was to create a flavor that reflected one of our favorite Rooty drinks.

  1. First, we built the rooty base of the flavor by carefully selecting and balancing spices and unique earth tones in minute amounts.
  2. Then, we endeavored to replicate the sweet syrupy goodness of the flavor.
  3. Once we got that exactly right, it was time to blend these two flavor profiles together! We took the rootiness and the sweetness (which we referred to as dark and light) and combined them. This last phase took the longest because we wanted to ensure we achieved the perfect balance between light and dark.

The result is a beautifully crafted E-juice that preserves the earthy authenticity of the flavor that is now enjoyable in your vaping device. Say goodbye to calories and cavities, The Root will satisfy your rooty cravings.

Now, with the Black Edition we took this flavor to the next level by amplifying our secret conduction making the taste and smell stronger with every puff you take. 

This collection is offered in 20 mg (2.0%) BoldSalts. It follows BC Compliance laws and on top of that, we've devised a proprietary nicotine blend that combines our Freebase and NicSalts to make the perfect nicotine hit in every Flaving device!

VG Ratios:

  • All salt variants - 50% VG

Note: All our salts are made from benzoic acid free nicotine salts!

entry.title: Cactus Jango - Black Edition
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Bold Salts
Price: 19.99

Cactus Jango is one of VanGo Vapes crown jewels. Released in 2017, it came out of a challenge to stand up and be a fruit flavored vape like no other. Containing unique fruits like Jackfruit, Lychee and Cactus with popping flavors like Strawberry and Mango that will keep you excited with every puff from your vape. 

Now, with the Black Edition we took this flavor to the next level by amplifying our secret recipe making the taste and smell stronger with every puff you take. 

This collection is offered in 20 mg (2.0%) BoldSalts. It follows BC Compliance laws and on top of that, we've devised a proprietary nicotine blend that combines our Freebase and NicSalts to make the perfect nicotine hit in every Flaving device!

VG Ratios:

  • All salt variants - 50% VG

Note: All our salts are made from benzoic acid free nicotine salts!

entry.title: Frozen Ophelia - Black Edition
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Bold Salts
Price: 19.99

Frozen Ophelia is our number one top selling flavor. We used our signature menthol blend that keeps you refreshed, but does not overwhelm the beautiful fruity mixture we combined with the menthol. We infused cactus fruit, mango, strawberry and kiwi to create a smooth a refreshing vaping experience that makes it the perfect all day vape. 

Now, with the Black Edition we took this flavor to the next level by amplifying our secret recipe making the taste and smell stronger with every puff you take. 

This collection is offered in 20 mg (2.0%) BoldSalts. It follows BC Compliance laws and on top of that, we've devised a proprietary nicotine blend that combines our Freebase and NicSalts to make the perfect nicotine hit in every Flaving device!

VG Ratios:

  • All salt variants - 50% VG

Note: All our salts are made from benzoic acid free nicotine salts!
